<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.1</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <plugin id="com.glide.email_outbound" name="Outbound Email Notifications" state="published" help="Outbound email" provider_name="Service-now.com" version="1.0.1" startup="com.glide.email_outbound.PluginStartup">
<description> Outbound emails. </description>
<extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="subscription_cache" class="com.glide.notification.cmn.SubscriptionCacheInvalidationEngine" /> <extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="notif_engine" class="com.glide.email_outbound.NotificationEngine" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UserNotificationDevices" class="com.glide.notification.javascript.device.UserNotificationDevices" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="VoiceDevice" class="com.glide.notification.javascript.device.VoiceDevice" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMSDevice" class="com.glide.notification.javascript.device.SMSDevice" />
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Outbound emails.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Outbound email</help> <id>com.glide.email_outbound</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Outbound Email Notifications</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.email_outbound/</path> <provider>Service-now.com</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.email_outbound</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.1</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
